map.soft_key: soft diffused key light, gentle falloff and natural skin rolloff
map.hard_key: hard directional key light, crisp shadows and high micro-contrast
map.rim_light: thin rim light separating subject from background, subtle edge highlights
map.top_light: soft top light shaping forehead and cheekbones, controlled shadow depth
map.practical_mixed: mixed practical lighting, imperfect and realistic, subtle uneven exposure
map.moonlit_ambient: cool moonlit ambient illumination, minimal catchlight, restrained contrast
map.firelight_accent: warm firelight as secondary accent, physically plausible flicker and soft bloom
map.soft_bloom_diffusion: cinematic diffusion with restrained bloom, highlights softened without fantasy glow
